blogPost.excerpt: We collected 2.8m podcast connections according to the "Listeners Also Subscribed To" data in Apple Podcasts. Now you can vizualize any podcast's neighbours (and it's neighbour's neighbours) in a 3D graph and see which other podcasts share a similar audience.
blogPost.body: We collected 2.8m podcast connections according to the "Listeners Also Subscribed To" data in Apple Podcasts. Now you can vizualize any podcast's neighbours (and it's neighbour's neighbours) in a 3D graph and see which other podcasts share a similar audience.
blogPost.title: The Podcast Audience Graph - Visualize podcast audience connections in 3D.
blogPost.author: James Potter

localize.description: 我们根据Apple Podcasts中的 "听众也订阅 "数据收集了280万个播客连接。现在，你可以在3D图中直观地看到任何播客的邻居（以及它的邻居的邻居），并看到哪些其他播客有类似的听众。
localize.tagline: 以3D方式可视化播客的受众连接。

localize.description: 我們根據Apple Podcasts中的 "聽衆也訂閱 "數據收集了280萬個播客連接。現在，你可以在3D圖中直觀地看到任何播客的鄰居（以及它的鄰居的鄰居），並看到哪些其他播客有類似的聽衆。
localize.tagline: 以3D方式可視化播客的受衆連接。

previous.excerpt: Newny is a Live Q&A, Feedback and Insights tool made for organisations that use webinars, workshops and other forms of virtual events as a customer engagement channel.
previous.title: Newny - Live Q&A, feedback and Insights tool for virtual events

localize.description: Newny是一款实时问答、反馈和见解工具，适用于使用网络研讨会、研讨会和其他形式的虚拟活动作为客户参与渠道的组织。
localize.tagline: 虚拟活动的现场问答、反馈和洞察工具

localize.description: Newny是一款實時問答、反饋和見解工具，適用於使用網絡研討會、研討會和其他形式的虛擬活動作爲客戶參與渠道的組織。
localize.tagline: 虛擬活動的現場問答、反饋和洞察工具

next.excerpt: We bought likely 2024 presidential candidates URLs. We broke each URL into 100 shares that we are now selling for $1 per share. You buy shares of the URLs you want, and if we sell it you get a cut of the money.
next.title: In The Year 2024 - We have future presidents' domains - buy shares and get paid

localize.description: 我们买了可能的2024年总统候选人的网址。我们把每个网址分成100股，现在以每股1美元的价格出售。你买了你想要的网址的股份，如果我们卖掉它，你就能得到分红。
localize.tagline: 我们有未来总统的域名--买股票就能获得报酬。

localize.description: 我們買了可能的2024年總統候選人的網址。我們把每個網址分成100股，現在以每股1美元的價格出售。你買了你想要的網址的股份，如果我們賣掉它，你就能得到分紅。
localize.tagline: 我們有未來總統的域名--買股票就能獲得報酬。
